page.title: 17 FAVERSHAM CARNIVAL
page.content: {Faversham Carnival} is a torchlight procession which takes place on a Saturday in the middle of October.There are about one hundred entries for the procession,consisting of about sixty decorated floats,several bands,some Majorettes,walking groups of fancy dress and thirty collectors with buckets.On one of the floats rides the {Faversham Carnival Queen} and her three {Princesses}.The Carnival Queens from other local towns ride on some of the other floats.The Carnival processio n begins at seven pm and takes three hours to go round the one mile route ,watched by as many as ten thousand spectators.Some of the money collected is given to local organisations which help the young and old.The rest of the money,and other funds raised during the year go to the carnival.It takes a whole year to prepare the carnival.
